description:
Paul Wagner is looking for a little instruction in the art of self-defense, so he submits to learn from his friend Joey Baltimore, who is clearly trained and willing to instruct. After some initial instruction in the art of throwing blows and floor grappling, Paul shows Joey a few expert 'blowing' maneuvers of his own. Before too long, Joey realizes that the teacher has quickly become the student, and this is going to be one hard lesson.

Enjoy!
title: Hard Lesson
